parameters:
# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

loadChangelog - parses example changelog markdown

# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: updateToggleElmLabel updates toggle label for "toggle1" correctly
useTranslations returns correct translation for key "description"
updateSelectElmLabel updates select label for "qux" correctly
Clack - useClackErrorPromise returns Effect that fails with ClackError if error is thrown
ImportPostsEndpointConfig - should create config with useBlogPkg: false
useTranslatedPath returns path without lang prefix for English when showDefaultLang is false
Libravatar Utils - getAvatarUrl throws if no email or openid
generateSitemapContent throws for config.sitemap as boolean false
pathToFileURL - should convert Unix path to file URL
throwMsg logs and throws correctly based on type
StudioCMSError should create an error with the correct properties
Libravatar Utils - parseUserIdentity with input {"openid":"not a url"}
action - should return undefined for meta keys (except escape)
createClackMessageUpdate - should create a render function
action - should return "down" for down arrow
Libravatar Utils - composeAvatarUrl with delegationServer="custom.example.com:8080" and https=false
User Module - getUserPasswordHash returns the user password
remapFilterSitemap should return correct locations for filter 'blog'
CheckIfUnsafe.password - should return false for password "uniquepassword123"
sitemap-index.xml GET returns correct XML response with dynamic URLs
Colorway - should apply StudioCMS warn color
should handle edge case dimensions: width=0, height=0
generateHostContent throws for host as number
RawPageData - should ensure config is defined
pathWithBase - Strips leading slash and prepends one
sitemap-index.xml GET returns empty sitemapindex if no sitemaps
AuthKitOptions - throws if session.expTime is invalid
convertToSafeString - trims leading and trailing underscores
resolveRoot - should use process.cwd() when no path provided
ColumnType with Select: string, Insert: number, Update: boolean
RenderedProtectData should validate rendered protected data structure
closeOnOutsideClock - should dispatch toggle-app event on outside click
action - should return undefined for meta control keys (ctrl + meta)
Should handle StudioCMS flavor with 'vitepress' callout theme
pathToFileURL - should convert Windows path to file URL
Colorway - should apply StudioCMS primary color
generateHostContent returns empty string for host: false
setLocals - merges general values without overwriting security/plugins
ImportEndpointConfig - should ensure config is defined
should generate Cloudinary URL for external HTTPS image
KyselyTableManager can create and manage plugin tables
loadChangelog - parses GitHub usernames to links

# @withstudiocms/config-utils

## 0.1.0-beta.3

### Patch Changes

- [#685](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/685) [`169c9be`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/169c9be7649bbd9522c6ab68a9aeca4ebfc2b86d) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Add tests to ensure functionality of main utils

## 0.1.0-beta.2

### Patch Changes

- [#666](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/666) [`0b1574b`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/0b1574bfe32ef98dc62ed9082a132a540f0ad4ba) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Tweak watch config utility to be a builder akin to the configresolver util

## 0.1.0-beta.1

### Patch Changes

- [#657](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/pull/657) [`a05bb16`](https://github.com/withstudiocms/studiocms/commit/a05bb16d3dd0d1a429558b4dce316ad7fb80b049) Thanks [@Adammatthiesen](https://github.com/Adammatthiesen)! - Migrate to using new config utils package that contains generic config helpers instead of relying on specific ones built-in to studiocms

children.name: RenderedProtectData should reject data without required fields
Should return original src when cloud name is empty string
CheckIfUnsafe.username - should return false for username "not_reserved_user"
pathWithBase - Strips leading slash and prepends one
fileWithBase - Strips leading slash and prepends one
readJson - throws SyntaxError if file content is invalid JSON
getSluggedRoute - should return correct slugged route
validateUrl throws for invalid sitemap url: http://example.com/sitemap.doc
validateHost throws for invalid host: invalid_host
convertToSafeString - trims leading and trailing underscores
